name: User Interviews
description: One-on-one conversations to understand user needs and pain points
when_to_use: Core discovery method for understanding real problems

name: Contextual Inquiry
description: Observe users in their natural environment while they perform tasks
when_to_use: Understanding real workflows and pain points in context

name: Diary Studies
description: Users document their experiences over time in a structured journal
when_to_use: Tracking behavior patterns and pain points over time

name: Focus Groups
description: Moderated group discussion to explore attitudes and perceptions
when_to_use: Gathering diverse perspectives on a topic quickly

name: Card Sorting
description: Participants organize topics into categories that make sense to them
when_to_use: Designing information architecture and navigation

name: Usability Testing
description: Observe users completing tasks on a prototype or product
when_to_use: Validating design decisions and finding usability issues

name: Ethnographic Observation
description: Deep immersive observation of user behavior without intervention
when_to_use: Understanding cultural and behavioral context

name: Stakeholder Interviews
description: Structured conversations with project stakeholders to align expectations
when_to_use: Aligning on project goals and constraints early

name: Surveys
description: Structured questionnaires to gather data from a large sample
when_to_use: Quantifying attitudes and preferences at scale

name: A/B Testing
description: Compare two versions to measure which performs better
when_to_use: Validating design or feature decisions with data

name: Analytics Review
description: Analyze existing product or market data for patterns
when_to_use: Leveraging existing data before primary research

name: Heatmap Analysis
description: Visual representation of where users click or look on a page
when_to_use: Understanding user attention and interaction patterns

name: Funnel Analysis
description: Analyze conversion rates at each step of a user flow
when_to_use: Identifying drop-off points in user journeys

name: Benchmark Metrics
description: Collect quantitative data about competitor performance
when_to_use: Establishing baseline performance targets

name: JTBD Analysis
description: Identify functional emotional and social jobs users hire products for
when_to_use: Understanding true customer motivations beyond features

name: PESTEL Analysis
description: Analyze Political Economic Social Technological Environmental Legal factors
when_to_use: Understanding macro-environment impact on the project

name: Root Cause Analysis
description: Systematic investigation to find the fundamental cause of a problem
when_to_use: Moving past symptoms to identify the real problem

name: Value Proposition Canvas
description: Map customer jobs pains gains against product value propositions
when_to_use: Ensuring product-market fit alignment

name: Assumption Mapping
description: List and rank assumptions by risk and uncertainty
when_to_use: Identifying which assumptions to test first

name: Five Whys
description: Ask why 5 times to find root cause of a problem
when_to_use: Quick root cause investigation

name: Empathy Map
description: Map what users Think Feel Say Do to build deep understanding
when_to_use: Building empathy for target users

name: Competitive Analysis
description: Structured comparison of competitors on key dimensions
when_to_use: Understanding competitive landscape and positioning

name: Trend Analysis
description: Identify and analyze emerging trends in the market
when_to_use: Spotting opportunities and threats in the market

name: Market Sizing TAM SAM SOM
description: Estimate Total Addressable Serviceable and Obtainable market
when_to_use: Quantifying the market opportunity

name: Blue Ocean Strategy
description: Identify uncontested market space by analyzing value factors
when_to_use: Finding differentiation beyond competing on existing factors

name: Porter Five Forces
description: Analyze competitive forces: rivalry substitutes buyers suppliers new entrants
when_to_use: Understanding industry dynamics and competitive pressure
